attributes.action: TV Programme needed for over-looked rescue Dogs/Cats to help them find homes
attributes.additional_details:
Too many breed for money. Many dogs are given away/sold on when not wanted anymore. Other dogs are passed about from home to home/dumped & then many are stuck in rescue(kennels) 

If more OVERLOOKED rescue dogs/animals were shown on TV it would improve their chances of finding their forever homes massively.

*I have made this petition to purely raise awareness*

PLEASE sign & share to support this petition if you want to see more rescue animals shown on TV. They need the public's help 
Ty x
attributes.background:
There is a big problem in the UK with rescue animals.

Many wait months/years for the right home & sadly too many are put to sleep due to no space for them. 

Some shut down & suffer from kennel stress. Very sad situation :( 

*There needs to be a law put in place ASAP for breeding in the UK*

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individual broadcasters.
